item.description:
TC: Anne catwoman@mosaicmass.org

EVENT: Celebrate the festival of Sukkot with your
friends from MOSAIC at the home and Sukkah of a member.
You will have the opportunity (weather permitting) to fulfill
the mitzvah of eating in the Sukkah and saying the blessing
over the lulav and the etrog. You’ll also have the
opportunity to enjoy a light nosh and beverages. Kosher
food will be provided.

RSVP: REQUIRED by October 12. Limited to 40 people,
so RSVP EARLY. Mail check made out to MOSAIC Outdoor
Mountain Club of MA to P. O. Box 1821, Brookline, MA 02446-0015.
Your RSVP is not confirmed until payment is received.
MEET: 8 – 11PM, Member's home in Newton. Location
will be given out when RSVP & payment is received.
COST: $6 + additional $5 for non-members
item.how_to_find_us: Contact the event's coordinator (TC) Anne for Directions

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: 3rd ANNUAL SUKKOT PARTY
